meanings.sent1: The tiny seed was the quintillionth to sprout in the garden.
meanings.sent2: The scientist discovered a quintillionth star in the sky.
meanings.sent3: The quintillionth raindrop fell right on the tip of my nose.
meanings.sent4: Her voice was as soft as a quintillionth whisper in the wind.
meanings.sent5: The quintillionth petal on the flower was the most delicate.

meanings.definition: The position of one quintillionth in a series.
meanings.sent1: In the line, he stood at the quintillionth spot.
meanings.sent2: The lottery winner held the quintillionth ticket.
meanings.sent3: Reaching the quintillionth level in the game felt like a major achievement.
meanings.sent4: She was the quintillionth person to cross the finish line.
meanings.sent5: The treasure was hidden at the quintillionth mark on the map.

meanings.definition: Being one quintillionth in a series.
meanings.sent1: The quintillionth piece of the puzzle finally fit perfectly.
meanings.sent2: The tiny fish was the quintillionth to swim by.
meanings.sent3: His quintillionth attempt at juggling ended in a mess.
meanings.sent4: The quintillionth wave crashed gently on the shore.
meanings.sent5: The quintillionth snowflake landed softly on her glove.
